name: Skinny Bitch Apparel
tag_list: fashion, style, brands, ecommerce, denim, apparel, clothing, vintage, womens-apparel
overview:
Founded in June 2011, Skinny Bitch Apparel seeks to make a name and set the stage for today’s fearless female who sees no shame in standing up and standing out. And because we care so much about our world and all the women in it, we are dedicated to not only clothing these women in confidence but giving back as well. A percentage of sales from specially selected tees will be continually contributed to the Global Fund for Women, which supports women’s rights and well-being worldwide. The shop seeks to cater towards petite and smaller sizes but do carry a full range of sizes.

Drawing almost exclusively from Los Angeles based fashion brands, Skinny Bitch Apparel is able to support the dreams of some awesome local designers. Skinny Bitch Apparel also carries popular brands such as Cheap Monday, Lucca Couture, and UNIF. Many items are custom cut for a truly unique look. They also have a carefully selected vintage collection.
